availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathaniel H. Beckham (Warren County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Elizabeth Beckham. Resident of Warren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Farmer in McLain County, Illinois, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 2, p. 73A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 1, p. 819.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, McLain County, IL, June 1863, p. 53.
"Nathaniel Henderson Beckham (1836-1923)," Find A Grave, Memorial #12947130, Accessed June 30, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/12947130.
